WorkItem.ClosedComment: Was caused by US/EU Armories using out of sync talent formats. Should have been fixed a long time ago.Spydur, resubmit a ticket if you still cannot load from Armory.
WorkItem.Description: i downloaded rawr to my computer and then unzipped it. when i opened it up i went to load character, and when i typed in me characters name and realm and all that i started to find it and there i said error, and i have re downloaded it 3 times now and it is still saying the same thing. can anyone help me?

Comments.Message: You'll have to tell us what the error says.
See the thread on the discussions tab.

I have the same problem too. It only says "Rawr encountered an error retrieving the character CHARNAME@EU-SERVER from the armory".  I think that it's a problem related to the European Armory, probably they haven't updated the armory format yet, and the latest version of RAWR only supports the new one. Try with RAWR 2.2.8 and it should work.

Same error when loading character from armory:

Step Name: Get Character
Description: Rawr encountered an error retrieving the Character - Fozfor@EU-Twisting Nether from the armory
Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
   at Rawr.Armory.GetCharacter(CharacterRegion region, String realm, String name, String[]& itemsOnCharacter)
Seen the discusion tab, so update fix is comming soon.
Yeah, looks like eu.wowarmory.com is still using the old version of the Armory. I'm expecting it'll get updated today.

I upgraded to 2.2.9, and I still cannot load from the US Armory.  "No item returned from Armory for nnnnn" where nnnnn is the character number.  "Rawr encountered an error retrieving the character - name@US-server from the armory"
